description:
Continuous Delivery sounds easy in theory, but it’s hard to do in
practice. There are myriads of things you can and should do to get your
code delivered faster, reliably. We look at what we can do as Python
developers, or as a small or mid-sized team to make the industrialized
software development production chain come true.

-  What is Continuous Delivery?
-  Why should we do it?
-  We explain a hands-on process and show tools and platforms that can
   be used.

We may have time to try the demonstrated tools and setups in a hands-on
demo. Bring your own notebook and get an immediate feeling of CD.
title: Continuous Delivery for Python Developers
